"But I don't know what to blog about. "
I often hear that.  Friends and acquaintances who know that I blog, and who are eager to start themselves, but don't know what to write about...

summary: Today a friend shared a video on TikTok with me that I promptly sent to my wife because I knew she would find it funny.  It is funny (this is a non-tracked link).  A few hours later that friend said "Oh your wife has watched it" because TikTok notified him, with her username, that she had watched it...
title: Never Send me a TikTok Video
